original: 2.3.1. Paccuppannavāra🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānāti so vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānāti saḥ vedanā kkhandham parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: The Chapter on the Present🔽Does anyone who fully understands the form aggregate also fully understand the feeling aggregate? …

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānāti so rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā.🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānāti so vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā khandham parijānāti saḥ rūpa khandham parijānāti iti āmantā  yaḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānāti saḥ vedanā kkhandham na parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: Or does anyone who fully understands the feeling aggregate also fully understand the form aggregate? …🔽Does anyone who does not fully understand the form aggregate also not fully understand the feeling aggregate? …

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānāti so rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham na parijānāti saḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: Or does anyone who does not fully understand the feeling aggregate also not fully understand the form aggregate? …
